function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased use of public transport due to fear of contagion","Impact":"Reduction in public transport usage, leading to increased traffic and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Enhance perceived levels of safety and comfort in public transport","Technologies":"Improvement of ventilation systems, implementation of touchless payment systems","People":"Public transport users, general population","Owner":"Transport authorities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Shift to private vehicles and shared mobility services","Impact":"Increased congestion, environmental impact, and reliance on personal vehicles","Mitigation":"Incentivizing sustainable commuting, promoting shared mobility services, improving cycling infrastructure","Technologies":"Development of efficient shared mobility platforms, creation of dedicated cycling lanes","People":"General population, urban planners","Owner":"Transport authorities, urban planning authorities"}]}
